title: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku
synopsis: Ichirou Suzuki, a programmer nearing his thirties, is drowning in work. Worn out, he eventually has a chance to catch up on sleep, only to wake up and discover himself in a fantasy RPG world, which is mashed together from the games he was debugging in reality. In this new place, he realizes that not only has his appearance changed to a younger version of himself, but his name has also changed to Satou, a nickname he used while running beta tests on games.
voices: ['Horie, Shun', 'Yuuki, Aoi', 'Takahashi, Rie', 'Okuno, Kaya', 'Kouno, Hiyori', 'Hayase, Marika', 'Tsuda, Minami', 'Eino, Airi', 'Yasuno, Kiyono', 'Atsugi, Nanami']
staff: [['Oonuma, Shin', ['Director']], ['Gou, Fumiyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Watanabe, Takashi', ['Storyboard']], ['Wake Up, Girls!', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
